text: "One Armed Scissor" is a 2000 song by American post-hardcore band At the Drive-In. It was taken from their third studio album Relationship of Command. It went to number 64 in the United Kingdom, number 85 in Australia and number 26 on the Billboard Alternative Airplay chart. ==Track listing== # "One Armed Scissor" – 3:45 # "Pattern Against User" – 3:18 # "Incetardis" – 3:26 == References == Category:2000 songs Category:Debut singles
title: One Armed Scissor
